trans-unit.source: Specifies the type of object-bound smart tag with respect to how it was associated with the component.
trans-unit.target: 指定的对象绑定智能标记它已与该组件关联的类型。

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the two options for associating an object-bound smart tag to a component.
trans-unit.target: 下表介绍将对象绑定智能标记与组件相关联的两个选项。

trans-unit.source: |Smart-tag model|Description| |----------------------|-----------------| |Pull|The class derived from <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner> that is associated with the component overrides the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.ActionLists%2A> property to return the collection of smart tags for that component.| |Push|A call to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Add%2A> method explicitly associates the specified smart tags with the specified component.| For more information about these smart-tag models, see the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> classes.
trans-unit.target: |智能标记模型 |说明 | |----------------------|-----------------| |拉取 |类派生自<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner>与该键相关联重写<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.ActionLists%2A>属性返回的该组件的智能标记的集合，该组件。 | |推送 |对<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Add%2A>方法的调用显式指定的智能标记将与指定组件关联。 | 有关这些智能标记模型的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService>和<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>类。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Add%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.ActionLists%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner>
拉取模型仅限智能标记。
推送模型仅限智能标记。
